typeSystemDescription.name: Hw1TypeSystemDescriptor
typeSystemDescription.description: This the type system descriptor for homework 1. The descriptor consists of several basic components the processing system will utilize. Detailed information will be included in the each Java class generated.

typeDescription.name: hw1.type.input.Answer
typeDescription.description: The is an answer type. A isCorrect field will also be included in the type to make it complete

featureDescription.name: isCorrect
featureDescription.description: indicate whether the answer is an correct answer

typeDescription.name: hw1.type.input.Question
typeDescription.description: It is an question type. It should hold the same structure as the General type. However, it should be specified as the Question type to make its meaning clear.

typeDescription.name: hw1.type.input.Token
typeDescription.description: To tokenize the tokens by space and commas, semi-commas, and '?'.

typeDescription.name: hw1.type.General
typeDescription.description: General Annotaion and the basic annotation including the basic elements from its supertype. And it will also have confidence field since all the types includes it as a part.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: This field is shared by all the elements, so a general type could place it and other types may inherit this type.

typeDescription.name: hw1.type.output.AnswerScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Score contains an answer. However, since an answer is an object. It should be regarded as a component rather a supertype. Meanwhile, it should be considered as a middle type between input and final output.

featureDescription.name: answer
featureDescription.description: One answer should only contain one answer. So an object rather than an array is useful here.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: It is the score the corresponding answer holds for the method.

typeDescription.name: hw1.type.input.NGram
typeDescription.description: An Ngram may contain several tokens

featureDescription.name: elements
featureDescription.description: Elements should contain a list of tokens

typeDescription.name: hw1.type.input.NGramList
typeDescription.description: A Question should be converted to a NGramList since there might be more than one interpretation of NGrams to consider. A NGramList should consist all the NGrams one sentence may generate.

typeDescription.name: hw1.type.output.Evaluator
typeDescription.description: This is the format output for all three

featureDescription.name: question
featureDescription.description: It should output the question of the original problem.

featureDescription.name: answers
featureDescription.description: A list of answers and its corresponding score

featureDescription.name: totalRightAnswer
featureDescription.description: namely the N of the file input

featureDescription.name: pickedRightAnswer
featureDescription.description: the number of Right answer according to the scores by the scoring methods
